definition: to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: As stated above, the dome esoterically represents the womb giver of life.
sentences.chinese: 如上所述，祕傳的圓頂代表子宮生命的給予者。

sentences.english: ” he clarified with the master thinking he was about to be told the esoteric secret to meditation.
sentences.chinese: 他向這個大師求證，以爲他聽到的是冥想的祕傳祕訣。
